formatted_address: 2 Telok Blangah Way, Mt Faber, #01-04 Next to the Swimming Pool, SAFRA, Singapore 098803
name: Old Habits Cafe

reviews.text:
If you‚Äôre a fan of nostalgic gems, this caf√© is a must-visit.
Stepping inside feels like hopping into a time machine back to the 70s‚Äîcomplete with vintage toys, classic signage, and a super cozy vibe.

The food? Delicious. I had the pasta and it was full of flavour. The staff? Friendly, attentive, and made us feel right at home.

A hidden spot with both soul and taste. Will definitely be back!

My order was that Beef slice Carbonara. It‚Äôs very creamy but lack of cheese taste. But for this prices I can‚Äôt ask for much. üòú The slice beef was tender tho. Nicez. Beef stew was tender and the roost chicken nicely roost. Chicken meat not as tough and dry as I through.. overall was good place for family gathering meal together. üëçüèªüëçüèª

We absolutely enjoyed our meal here. The decor and items on display brought back lots of childhood memories. The food is tasty and portion is big. We ordered salmon alio oglio, classic chicken chop, roast chicken, truffle mushroom soup, burnt cheesecake, cappuccino, rootbeer float and old habits float.

This cafe is full of old toys and mint condition comics. Food is tasty and affordable. Located inside SAFRA this is a great place for lunch/dinner if you like Singapore style western food. We had mushroom soup, chicken chop, spaghetti, yuzu honey juice and red velvet cake and every item was well prepared.

Nostalgic theme caf√© usually don't focus much on food but I was not disappointed.

Had Salmon with lemon butter sauce and a root beer float. For the price and vibes, it deserves 5 stars.

The only inconvenience is a little far from the nearest subway. Suggest bus or cab.

Nicely located next to a walking trail up Mount Faber. After a heavy meal, you can burn it off üòâ.

Kudos for the nostalgia stomach-filling experience.

vicinity: 2 Telok Blangah Way, Mt Faber, #01-04 Next to the Swimming Pool, SAFRA
